title: Collapsibles API - Collapsible - Collapsible Context
content:
<PropName
  name="isOpen"
  type="boolean"
  isContextProp
/>
The current status of the collapsible.
<PropName
  name="rootClass"
  type="string"
  isContextProp
/>
The root class for the collapsible. Appends classPrefix to the class name, when defined.
<PropName
  name="handleClick"
  type="method"
  isContextProp
/>
Used internally to report the toggle to the nearest <CollapsibleGroup>, if nested.
<PropName
  name="id"
  type="string"
/>
A unique ID used to match ARIA attributes between the collapsible components. Defaults to a random 6 character string using the nanoid. See accessibility for full details.
<BasicContext href="#collapsible-props" />
</JumplistNode>
<JumplistNode nodeID="content">
